issues: Flutter version requirement should be 3.24+ not 3.22 for stable Wasm support
Build output structure is partially accurate but missing some files like flutter_bootstrap.js in some cases
Hot reload support for Wasm is limited - lesson says 'where available' but should be more specific about Flutter 3.35+ improvements
The --release flag is redundant - 'flutter build web --wasm' already produces release builds
recommendations: Clarify that hot reload for web Wasm improved significantly in Flutter 3.35
Remove redundant --release flag example or explain when it's necessary
Add note about checking package compatibility on pub.dev

gaps: No mention of dart:html/package:js deprecation blocking Wasm compilation
Missing explanation of what happens when packages aren't Wasm-compatible
No coverage of multi-threading configuration and COOP/COEP headers
Missing information about debugging Wasm builds
recommendations: Add WARNING section about package compatibility and JS interop migration
Include section on multi-threading requirements (HTTP headers: COOP, COEP)
Add troubleshooting guide for common Wasm build errors
Explain how to check if packages support Wasm on pub.dev

outdatedItems: Debugging experience note is vague - should reference current tooling state
recommendations: Add mention of Flutter 3.35 web hot reload improvements
Update debugging section with current DevTools capabilities

missingPrerequisites: Understanding of release vs debug builds
Basic familiarity with browser developer tools
unansweredQuestions: How do I debug Wasm builds effectively?
What do I do if a package I need doesn't support Wasm?
How can I measure the performance difference between JS and Wasm?
Can I use Wasm for development and fall back to JS for incompatible browsers?
missingUseCases: Migrating existing Flutter web project to Wasm
Setting up CI/CD pipeline for Wasm builds
Testing Wasm builds locally before deployment
recommendations: Add section on package compatibility checking workflow
Include debugging tips specific to Wasm builds
Add comparison of build sizes and load times between modes

shortSections.recommendation: Expand to include COOP/COEP headers, package compatibility, and JS interop migration requirements

suggestedNewContent.title: Package Compatibility for Wasm
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover dart:html and package:js deprecation, migration to package:web and dart:js_interop, how to check pub.dev for Wasm compatibility

suggestedNewContent.title: Multi-threading Configuration
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain COOP/COEP headers required for multi-threaded Wasm, how to configure server headers, performance benefits of multi-threading

suggestedNewContent.title: Debugging Wasm Builds
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Show how to use Chrome DevTools with Wasm, source maps, common error messages and solutions
